SummaryEnglish: The daily adventures of Bananya, a cat with dreams to become a chocolate-covered banana, and his friends.

1.TitleEnglish: The Kitty Who Lives in a Banana
1.SummaryEnglish: Bananya is an adorable kitty who lives inside a banana and wishes to bathe in chocolate.

2.SummaryEnglish: Meet all of Bananya's adorable friends!

3.SummaryEnglish: Bananya spends some time channel surfing with the help of Baby Bananya.

7.TitleEnglish: Bananya in the Middle of the Night, Nya

8.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Stray Cat, Nya

1.SummaryEnglish: Another day has begun. At the foot of a cat-shaped mountain sits a field of banana trees. As the bananas grow, out of them pop mysterious creatures that look a bit like cats and a bit like bananas... the bananyas! This is the rather bizarre story of a curious bunch of friends... nya!

2.SummaryEnglish: Meowteors rain down from the big round thing in the sky, and the bananyas collect them. They then carry all the meowteors to the elder's house. The elder grants permission, and the bananyas begin to... nya?!

3.SummaryEnglish: A meowteor twinkles as it falls to the ground. It bumps into a small banana... and out of the banana pops the adorable Droopy-eared Bananya! All of the bananyas fall in love with her cuteness, nya...

4.SummaryEnglish: Bananya is in the mood to do ninja things after reading a ninja manga, so he and Droopy-eared Bananya become Ninja Bananya's disciples. The run through fields, dive underwater, fly through the sky... but then all the other bananyas suddenly show up. Nyan-nyan!

5.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Mysterious Mansion, Nya
5.SummaryEnglish: Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya are walking in the mountains when it starts to rain, so they take shelter in a mysterious mansion. Inside, they encounter the ominous figure of Scientist Bananya. They run away in shock, but something even more frightening awaits... Nyaaaa!

6.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Robot Cat, Nya
6.SummaryEnglish: Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya are enjoying some fishing when, to their surprise, they fish up a robot cat! They're both thrilled to have a new friend. They play hide-and seek, take catnaps, and even run through a field of flowers together! But then the robot cat stops moving... Nya, nya...

7.SummaryEnglish: The whole village has turned out for a music festival. Appearing on stage is... On guitar, Emo Bananya! On drums, Metal Bananya! And on vocals, Vampire Bananya! The festival reaches its climax as everyone gets into their hardcore rhythms, but then it suddenly starts to rain... Nya♪ Nya♪ Nya♪ Nya♪

8.SummaryEnglish: The cat-shaped mountain blows its top again, signaling the arrival of another meowteor. It turns out to be... a device that translates the bananyas' language??? Just what do the bananyas talk about every day, anyway? Fantastic!

9.SummaryEnglish: Today is the annual festival. Many stalls have been set up, and everyone's having a great time! Then comes the long-awaited Bon dance, and finally, an extravagant fireworks show! But the ones launching the fireworks are... the Zombie Bananyas?! Nyaaa nya-nyaaa!

10.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Round Thing of Dreams, Nya
10.SummaryEnglish: Another meowteor falls from the sky. As he approaches it, Bananya realizes that it looks just like the round thing in the sky. He immediately takes it to the elder, who shows him many pictures of the round thing in the sky, much to Bananya's delight. But before he realizes it... nyaaa... zzz

11.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Lost Item, Nya
11.SummaryEnglish: As Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya are walking alongside the river, a strange wand floats their way. They ask the elder about it, and he says it belongs to the legendary Rainbow Bananya. So they set out to return the wand to its owner, but... nyanya?

12.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Legendary Bananya, Nya
12.SummaryEnglish: Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya meet the legendary Rainbow Bananya... along with her sister, Night Rainbow Bananya! To thank them for returning her wand, Rainbow Bananya says she'll grant any wish for them... What will Bananya wish for?! Nyaaaaaa☆彡

13.TitleEnglish: Bananya and the Big Round World, Nya
13.SummaryEnglish: Bananya looks around. What is this place??? It looks like the legendary Rainbow Bananya has used her powers to send him to the big round thing in the sky, just like he always dreamed of! And there he meets... Oh my nya!

3.SummaryEnglish: Bananya returns! The mysterious cat who lives inside a banana is back for a new adventure when a ball of light appears. After the ball flashes, a new cat named Baby Sweet emerges. The two quickly become friends and set off on a grand adventure to discover new and exciting places around the world. Join the new friends on their journey!

1.SummaryEnglish: A lone planet hangs in the universe. This colorful planet of blue skies, white clouds, and green earth is where Bananya spends his leisurely days. One day, Baby Sweet suddenly appears before Bananya. The two quickly become friends and set out on a wondrous journey.

2.TitleEnglish: Going Tropical with an Eternal Summer Mood, Nya!
2.SummaryEnglish: Baby Sweet starts glowing, and the next thing he knows, Bananya is on an island where summer lasts forever. Bananya and Baby Sweet join Eternal Summer Bananya in fun activities like surfing, free diving, and beach volleyball. As they're lounging in the sea, they see a dorsal fin cruising their way! Bananya and friends may be in trouble!

3.TitleEnglish: Rowdy Ruffians Race Across the Wastes, Nya!
3.SummaryEnglish: Bananya and Baby Sweet reach a wasteland where dry grasses tumble across the ground. As they're looking around, they suddenly find themselves surrounded by a bunch of Rowdy Bananyas. Then our very own Western Bananya shows up, and the desert showdown begins. Who will stand victorious?!

4.SummaryEnglish: Bananya and Baby Sweet come across a coffin in a dark, gloomy mansion. As Bananya carefully investigates, a strange shadow appears behind him! Startled, the duo runs away as quickly as they can, but more mysterious shadows appear one after another, refusing to let them get away! Can Bananya and Baby Sweet escape the mansion?

5.TitleEnglish: A Hero Flies Onto the Scene, Nya!

6.TitleEnglish: Strive to Be the King of Sports, Nya!

8.TitleEnglish: Lost on a Snowy Mountain, Nya!

11.TitleEnglish: The Great Warring States Battle, Nya!
